/usr/bin/c++   -pipe -std=c++17 -pthread   CMakeFiles/renderer.dir/main.cc.o CMakeFiles/renderer.dir/glad.c.o CMakeFiles/renderer.dir/vertexBuffer.cc.o CMakeFiles/renderer.dir/indexBuffer.cc.o CMakeFiles/renderer.dir/shader.cc.o CMakeFiles/renderer.dir/texture.cc.o CMakeFiles/renderer.dir/vertexArray.cc.o CMakeFiles/renderer.dir/mesh.cc.o CMakeFiles/renderer.dir/model.cc.o CMakeFiles/renderer.dir/debug.cc.o  -o renderer  -lglfw -lGL -lm -lXrandr -lXi -lX11 -lXxf86vm -lpthread -ldl -lXinerama -lXcursor -lassimp
